page.title: 01Halling by Paul,Roy and Alex
page.content:
Halling is a country village near the River Medway and close to the Medway Towns.It has three different sections.They are Upper Halling,Lower Halling and North Halling.There is a By-Pass being built to quieten the village.
Lower Halling has a garage,a grocer's shop,a Post Office and a newsagent's.There are three pubs and a Working Mens Club, which opened in 1984.A central heating shop has recently opened.Halling also has a cement factory called Rugby Cement.
Halling is a very nice village with a village school and a part-time fire brigade .There are two recreation grounds,one is a football pitch and the other a play area.
